add_right: Adds an element on the right
add_left: Adds an element on the left
lang.change: The language has been changed to :
help: Displays all commands and their descriptions.
lang.help:
=== Lang Command ===
Usage: lang [command]
        \-> Alias : changelang / editlang / language

Commands:
  list         : List all available languages
  edit         : Change the language interactively
   \-> Alias : change / edit
  <language>       : Set the current language to the specified value

Example:
  lang en   : Set the current language to English
prompt.help:
=== Prompt Command ===
Usage: prompt [command]
        \-> Alias : changeprompt / editprompt

Commands:
  show         : Displays the current prompt
  edit         : Change the prompt interactively
   \-> Alias : change / edit

Example:
  prompt edit   : Edit the prompt as you want
prompt.colors: Displays the following text in a certain color.
prompt.workingset: Displays the amount of memory used by the current process.
